column4: has anyone successfully installed beryl + aiglx with a Radeon 9800 Pro???
did u follow a particular guide?
No. It's an R300, it's supposed by the open source drivers.
The 9800, I suspect, probably isn't an R300?
xorg.cong has it as a R350 NH
the xorg-driver-fglrx is not open source??
The "radeon" driver is open source, and has recent support for full acceleration on R300 and below.
any trustworthy guides for the 9800 card?
